items.title: Graphene OS: a security-enhanced Android build
items.summary: Graphene OS is a security-enhanced Android build that aims to enhance the security of users' phones, which have access to vast amounts of personal data.

items.summary: pydantic-ai-examples 0.4.7 provides examples of how to use Pydantic AI and showcases its capabilities.

items.title: A Game-Changing Deal May Flip The Script For This Understated Stock
items.summary: A game-changing acquisition has put this under-the-radar stock in the spotlight, making it one to watch for potential growth. With upcoming earnings on the horizon, there is anticipation for further developments in the company.

items.summary: Google launches Web Guide lab using AI to organize search results by topic.

items.title: Ignoring the wishful wishing
items.summary: The U.S. Supreme Court's decision to allow a president to ignore the law raises ethical concerns as it can lead to the president becoming above the law.

items.summary: New survey reveals that there is plenty of budget available for AI investment, but executives are hesitant to spend due to 'decision paralysis'.

items.title: President Trump: "What the hell is NVIDIA? I've never heard of it before" — but is it right to dunk on him?
items.summary: President Trump expressed surprise at NVIDIA's AI dominance, raising questions about his awareness of technology advancements. However, he later praised the CEO, Jensen Huang, suggesting a complicated view on the issue.

items.title: Intel’s ‘Panther Lake’ CPUs remain on track amid massive layoffs
items.summary: Intel's 'Panther Lake' CPUs on track for shipping this year despite massive layoffs, company plans to end 2025 with 75,000 employees.

items.summary: Rumors suggest OpenAI is preparing to launch GPT-5 in August, marking a potential milestone in AI development.

items.title: S&P/TSX composite closes lower on Thursday, U.S. markets mixed
items.summary: S&P/TSX composite closes lower on Thursday, U.S. markets mixed. Losses in basic materials and consumer cyclicals contributed to the decline in Canada's main stock index.

items.summary: Kinhive launches AI matchmaking platform to connect women-led startups with skilled collaborators based on skills, working style, and availability, not just resumes.

items.summary: Human-like robot throws tantrum at San Francisco robotics lab, sparking concerns about the ethical implications of developing advanced AI technology.

items.title: This Bill Would Fine Social Media Companies $5 Million Every Day for Not Fighting 'Terrorism'
items.summary: The STOP HATE Act proposes fines for social media companies that do not take action against 'terrorism'. Rep. Josh Gottheimer is advocating for more censorial measures to be implemented.

items.summary: Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai has reached billionaire status as the company's stock approaches an all-time high. Unlike many tech industry leaders, Pichai did not attain his wealth through founding equity stakes in his platform.

items.title: Robophobia
items.summary: Robophobia, the irrational fear of robots, has been a popular term used online since the 2000s. In 2025, the term and related robophobic terms like 'clankers' became increasingly prominent.
